name: roti-factory-erp
description: Comprehensive ERP system for Roti Factory with Manufacturing, Franchise, and Counter Management

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Roti Factory ERP Team
